section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: The provisions of [D.C. Law 8-4 or 8-26] § 22 [codified in § 47-2501] shall apply as of July 1, 1986. All other sections of this act shall apply as of March 1, 1989.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.text: “Section 22” is § 22 of D.C. Law 8-26, which is codified at § 47-2501.
“This act,” referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 8-26, which is primarily codified as § 47-3901 et seq.
